Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.


Home

About

Tags

Feed

APIs.json

    LAW Divisions

    The Law Department is composed of 17 legal divisions. Three support divisions provide high quality services to the Law Department’s 650 attorneys.

    Latin Media Organizations

    Listing of Latin media organizations

    Latin Cultural Organizations

    Listing of Latin cultural organizations

    Landmarks Violations

    The Landmarks Violations contains information related to designated landmark violations issued by the LPC.

    Landmarks Complaints

    The Landmarks Complaint Log contains information related to designated landmark violation complaints received by the LPC.

    Landfills

    Directory of Landfills

    "Kids In Motion" Playground Programming

    Attendance information for the “Kids in Motion” program, which provides free activities in NYC’s playgrounds, including organized sports, games, fitness demos, and board games.
